title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 717.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 717.1 - General

State Regulations
(a) A building
or part or unit thereof that is operationally classified or reclassified as a
hospice inpatient facility or unit, or hospice residence shall, in addition to
meeting the requirements of sections
711.1, 711.2 and
711.3
of this Title, comply with
the following requirements of this Part. (b) All hospice inpatient facilities and
units, and hospice residences shall be designed to accommodate and accurately
reflect the approved operational and functional programs to be operated within
the facility, unit or residence, including all structural, environmental and
equipment features required to implement such approved programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
717.1

Amended

New

York State Register August 31, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 35, eff. 8/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
